headers: CRM ARCHITECTURE — THE MODEL IS THE CRM

rows.CRM ARCHITECTURE — THE MODEL IS THE CRM: Every tab in this model is a node in the customer relationship system.
Most companies treat CRM as a tool — Salesforce, HubSpot, a database.
We treat CRM as architecture. The entire ops model IS the CRM.
Every tab that touches a customer — ads, landing pages, email sequences,
product experience, support, retention, referral — is a node in a single
system that manages the complete customer relationship from first impression
The CRM is not a tool you bolt on. The CRM is the business itself,
This tab is the map. It shows how every customer-facing function connects
and where each customer lives in the relationship lifecycle.
